name: e-Zest Solutions
description:
e-Zest Solutions Ltd. is a CMMI Level 3 & an ISO 9001:2008 certified Product Engineering and Software Development Company, offers services to healthcare industries & ISVs. Its Healthcare Technology portfolio consists of services like Healthcare Software Services, Healthcare Software Product Development Outsourcing, Custom Healthcare Software Application Development and Pharma Sector Competency.
e-Zest helps healthcare organizations to manage challenges like increased government regulations, e-business challenges, rising patient expectations & demand for lower healthcare costs by offering expert application management services in areas like medical and life sciences etc.
